description: Number of 4-colorings of cyclic group of order n.
references: R. Haas, Three-colorings of finite groups or an algebra of nonequalities, Math. Mag., 63 (1990), 211-225.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
